item.title: The Morning After: Bono finally apologizes for that free iTunes U2 album
item.description: The Morning After: Bono finally apologizes for that free iTunes U2 album Once upon a time, back in 2014, U2 gave away an album's worth of songs to every iTunes user in the world.
